markdown.markdown:
***
::: {style="border: 1px solid white; padding: 1em; background-color: #f0f0f0;"} **Uncertainty Quantification of surrogate Models using Conformal Prediction** * Authors: Gopakumar, Vignesh; Gray, Ander; Oskarsson, Joel; Zanisi, Lorenzo; Pamela, Stanislas; Giles, Daniel; Kusner, Matt; Deisenroth, Marc * Published in: arXiv preprint arXiv:2408.09881, 2024 * TLDR: Guaranteed and valid error bars across spatio-temporal domains using conformal prediction. * [Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2408.09881) [Code](https://github.com/gitvicky/Spatio-Temporal-CP) ::: ::: {style="border: 1px solid white; padding: 1em; background-color: #f0f0f0;"} **Valid Error Bars for Neural Weather Models using Conformal Prediction** * Authors: Gopakumar, Vignesh; Oskarsson, Joel; Gray, Ander; Zanisi, Lorenzo; Pamela, Stanislas; Giles, Daniel; Kusner, Matt; Deisenroth, Marc * Published in: arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.14483, 2024 * TLDR: Marginal conformal prediction as a method of guaranteed error bars across neural weather models. * [Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2406.14483) [Code](https://github.com/gitvicky/neural-lam-CP) ::: ::: {style="border: 1px solid white; padding: 1em; background-color: #f0f0f0;"} **Plasma Surrogate Modelling using Fourier Neural Operators** * Authors: Gopakumar, Vignesh; Pamela, Stanislas; Zanisi, Lorenzo; Li, Zongyi; Gray, Ander; Brennand, Daniel; Bhatia, Nitesh; Stathopoulos, Gregory; Kusner, Matt; Deisenroth, Marc * Published in: Nuclear Fusion, Volume 64, Number 5, 2024 * TLDR: Multi-variable FNO designed to model the plasma evolution within a Tokamak across both simulations and experiment on the MAST Tokamak. * [Paper](https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/1741-4326/ad313a/meta) [Code](https://github.com/Plasma-FNO) :::
### 2023
::: {style="border: 1px solid white; padding: 1em; background-color: #f0f0f0;"} **Fourier-RNNs for Modelling Noisy Physics data** - Authors: Gopakumar, Vignesh; Pamela, Stanislas; Zanisi, Lorenzo - Published in: arXiv preprint arXiv:2302.06534, 2023 - TLDR: Recurrent Fourier neural operators with hidden state representations for non-markovian physcial modelling. - [Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2302.06534) ::: ::: {style="border: 1px solid white; padding: 1em; background-color: #f0f0f0;"} **Loss Landscape Engineering via Data Regulation on PINNs** * Authors: Gopakumar, Vignesh; Pamela, Stanislas; Samaddar, Debasmita * Published in: Machine Learning with Applications, Volume 12, 2023 * TLDR: Impact Data-Regulation has on smoothening the loss landscape of physics-informed neural networks for better convergence. * [Paper](https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2666827023000178) [Code](https://github.com/gitvicky/Loss_Landscape_PINNs) :::
### 2022
::: {style="border: 1px solid white; padding: 1em; background-color: #f0f0f0;"} **Image Mapping the Temporal Evolution of Edge Characteristics in Tokamaks using Neural Networks** * Authors: Gopakumar, Vignesh; Samaddar, Debasmita * Published in: Machine Learning: Science and Technology, Volume 1, Number 1, 2020 * TLDR: Branched fully convolutional network designed to emulate the plasma at the scrape-off layer with coupled plasma and neutral behaviour. * [Paper](https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.1088/2632-2153/ab5639/meta) :::
*** You can find the latest list of publications in my [google scholar page.](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=NQtqemwAAAAJ&hl=en)
